TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadStringCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadStringCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadStringCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadStringCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type UploadStringCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * UploadStringCompletedEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: Reprezentuje metodę, która będzie obsługiwać zdarzenia .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Po utworzeniu delegata, możesz zidentyfikować metody, która będzie obsługiwać zdarzenia.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Aby skojarzyć zdarzenia z programu obsługi zdarzeń, należy dodać wystąpienie delegata zdarzenia.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Program obsługi zdarzeń jest wywoływany przy każdym wystąpieniu zdarzenia, o ile nie usunięto delegata.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat delegatów obsługi zdarzeń, zobacz [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples Poniższy przykład kodu pokazuje asynchronicznie przekazywania ciągu.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading a string. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#38)] Poniższa metoda jest wywoływana po zakończeniu przekazywania.The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#39)]
